mapper.insert: insert into in009t( quote_no, tid, resultcode, resultmsg, paydate, paytime, payauthcode, cardcode, checkflg, payauthquota, prtccode, price ) values ( #{quote_no}, #{tid}, #{resultcode}, #{resultmsg}, #{paydate}, #{paytime}, #{payauthcode}, #{cardcode}, #{checkflg}, #{payauthquota}, #{prtccode}, #{price} )
